Text:
How come 2HD standard release so big?

The last two uploads:
Transporter The Series S01E05 Dead Drop HDTV x264-2HD [eztv]
01-27 04:12, Size 418.23 MiB, ULed by eztv

Transporter The Series S01E06 Hot Ice HDTV x264-2HD [eztv]
02-03 01:36, Size 364.58 MiB, ULed by eztv
If this is an official 2HD 720p release why is it in .avi? Shouldn't it be .mkv?

This is not a 2HD release. This is Transporter.The.Series.S01E11.Give.the.Guy.a.Hand.BDRip.XviD-BTN

I checked this by downloading this torrent and the .srt file it contains, copying the S01E11 BTN .avi file into the folder, renaming it to match the S01E07 .avi filename and running a recheck in the torrent client. The recheck reports 100% good, which proves this is the S01E11 BTN release.
